content: I think I'll go with a personal anecdote. I've had some experience with influencer marketing in the past, and I think I can share a relatable story that will resonate with my audience. Since I've been participating in a weekly challenge in the "Marketing Professionals Network" group on LinkedIn, I've been thinking about the role of social media in influencer marketing, and I have a specific example that comes to mind. I'll try to craft a engaging story around that. Thanks for the advice!
